name: copilot-ld
description: Intelligent chat agent built GitHub Copilot and Linked Data
author: D. Olsson <hi@senzilla.io>

scripts.data:init: mkdir -p generated data/eval data/memories data/policies data/resources data/graphs data/vectors data/tenants
scripts.data:clean: rm -rf generated data/eval data/memories data/policies data/resources data/graphs data/vectors data/tenants
scripts.data:reset: npm run data:clean && npm run data:init && npm run codegen
scripts.process: npm run process:assistants && npm run process:resources && npm run process:tools && npm run process:vectors && npm run process:graphs
scripts.process:fast: npm run process:assistants && npm run process:resources -- --fast && npm run process:tools && npm run process:vectors && npm run process:graphs
scripts.dev:restart: npm run dev:stop && npm run dev:start
scripts.docker: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up
scripts.test: find packages services test -name '*.test.js' | xargs node --test
scripts.test:watch: find packages services test -name '*.test.js' | xargs node --test --watch
scripts.check: npm run spellcheck && npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.check:fix: npm run spellcheck && npm run format:fix && npm run lint:fix
scripts.eval: npx env-cmd -- node ./scripts/dev.js --start --quiet && npx env-cmd -- npx --workspace=@copilot-ld/libeval evaluation
scripts.chat: npx env-cmd -- node ./scripts/dev.js --start --quiet && npx env-cmd -- node ./scripts/chat.js
scripts.search: npx env-cmd -- node ./scripts/dev.js --start --quiet && npx env-cmd -- node ./scripts/search.js
scripts.query: npx env-cmd -- node ./scripts/dev.js --start --quiet && npx env-cmd -- node ./scripts/query.js
